endpoints.description: Retrieve the current inventory levels of all listed consumer staples products.
Update the inventory levels with new data provided by the retailer.
Retrieve a list of stock level alerts based on predefined thresholds.
Set up or modify stock level alert parameters for specific products.
Access demand forecasting data for future sales of consumer staples.
List active integrations with ERP systems.
Add a new integration setup with an ERP system.
Retrieve recent and pending orders related to consumer staples inventory.
Place a new restock order for specified items.
Remove a product from the inventory tracking system.
